hi: I am trying to install the ivtv module as per the mythtv wiki guide.  I ran into a problem when I modprobed the new module "FATAL: Error inserting ivtv (/lib/modules/2.6.12-10-686/ivtv/ivtv.ko): Invalid module format"   Anyone know how to fix this?
